publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-714 Colin Fox: Australian Government's Treatment of Refugees-That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian government in refusing to grant sanctuary to refugees arriving there and in jeopardising the lives of such refugees by preventing them from reaching Australia, forcibly removing them, detaining them in prisons for indefinite periods of time and failing to grant residence when their refugee status has been recognised.

S2M-714 Colin Fox: Australian Government's Treatment of Refugees-That the Parliament condemns the actions of the Australian government in refusing to grant sanctuary to refugees arriving there and in jeopardising the lives of such refugees by preventing them from reaching Australia, forcibly removing them, detaining them in prisons for indefinite periods of time and failing to grant residence when their refugee status has been recognised. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*
S2M-714 Australian Government’s Treatment of Refugees (lodged on 8 December 2003) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-714 Australian Government's Treatment of Refugees (lodged on 8 December 2003) Rosie Kane*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-714 Australian Government’s Treatment of Refugees (lodged on 8 December 2003) Nicola Sturgeon*
